accounts.name: reserve
docs: CPI accounts

accounts.name: lending_market
docs: CPI accounts

errors.name: ReserveIsStale
errors.msg: Reserve is stale and must be refreshed before any operation

errors.name: NotEnoughLiquidityDisinvestedToSendToUser
errors.msg: Not enough liquidity disinvested to send to user

errors.name: ReserveSpaceExhausted
errors.msg: Vault have no space for new reserves

errors.name: AmountToWithdrawDoesNotMatch
errors.msg: Amount to withdraw does not match

errors.name: LiquidityToWithdrawDoesNotMatch
errors.msg: Liquidity to withdraw does not match

errors.name: UserReceivedAmountDoesNotMatch
errors.msg: User received amount does not match

errors.name: SharesBurnedAmountDoesNotMatch
errors.msg: Shares burned amount does not match

errors.name: DisinvestedLiquidityAmountDoesNotMatch
errors.msg: Disinvested liquidity amount does not match

errors.name: ManagementFeeGreaterThanMaxAllowed
errors.msg: Management fee is greater than maximum allowed

errors.name: VaultAUMZero
errors.msg: Vault assets under management are empty

errors.name: MinWithdrawAmountTooBig
errors.msg: Min withdraw amount is too big

errors.name: InvestTooSoon
errors.msg: Invest is called too soon after last invest

errors.name: ReserveHasNonZeroAllocationOrCTokens
errors.msg: Reserve has non-zero allocation or ctokens so cannot be removed

errors.name: DepositAmountGreaterThanRequestedAmount
errors.msg: Deposit amount is greater than requested amount

types.name: LastUpdate
docs: Last update state

fields.name: slot
docs: Last slot when updated

fields.name: stale
docs: True when marked stale, false when slot updated

fields.name: price_status
docs: Status of the prices used to calculate the last update

types.name: ReserveCollateral
docs: Reserve collateral

fields.name: mint_pubkey
docs: Reserve collateral mint address

fields.name: mint_total_supply
docs: Reserve collateral mint supply, used for exchange rate

fields.name: supply_vault
docs: Reserve collateral supply address

types.name: ReserveConfig
docs: Reserve configuration values

fields.name: status
docs: Status of the reserve Active/Obsolete/Hidden

fields.name: asset_tier
docs: Asset tier -> 0 - regular (collateral & debt), 1 - isolated collateral, 2 - isolated debt

fields.name: host_fixed_interest_rate_bps
docs: Flat rate that goes to the host

fields.name: reserved1
docs: [DEPRECATED] Space that used to hold 2 fields:
- Boost for side (debt or collateral)
- Reward points multiplier per obligation type
Can be re-used after making sure all underlying production account data is zeroed.

fields.name: protocol_order_execution_fee_pct
docs: Cut of the order execution bonus that the protocol receives, as a percentage

fields.name: protocol_take_rate_pct
docs: Protocol take rate is the amount borrowed interest protocol receives, as a percentage

fields.name: protocol_liquidation_fee_pct
docs: Cut of the liquidation bonus that the protocol receives, as a percentage

fields.name: loan_to_value_pct
docs: Target ratio of the value of borrows to deposits, as a percentage
0 if use as collateral is disabled

fields.name: liquidation_threshold_pct
docs: Loan to value ratio at which an obligation can be liquidated, as percentage

fields.name: min_liquidation_bonus_bps
docs: Minimum bonus a liquidator receives when repaying part of an unhealthy obligation, as bps

fields.name: max_liquidation_bonus_bps
docs: Maximum bonus a liquidator receives when repaying part of an unhealthy obligation, as bps

fields.name: bad_debt_liquidation_bonus_bps
docs: Bad debt liquidation bonus for an undercollateralized obligation, as bps

fields.name: deleveraging_margin_call_period_secs
docs: Time in seconds that must pass before redemptions are enabled after the deposit limit is
crossed.
Only relevant when `autodeleverage_enabled == 1`, and must not be 0 in such case.

fields.name: deleveraging_threshold_decrease_bps_per_day
docs: The rate at which the deleveraging threshold decreases, in bps per day.
Only relevant when `autodeleverage_enabled == 1`, and must not be 0 in such case.

fields.name: fees
docs: Program owner fees assessed, separate from gains due to interest accrual

fields.name: borrow_rate_curve
docs: Borrow rate curve based on utilization

fields.name: borrow_factor_pct
docs: Borrow factor in percentage - used for risk adjustment

fields.name: deposit_limit
docs: Maximum deposit limit of liquidity in native units, u64::MAX for inf

fields.name: borrow_limit
docs: Maximum amount borrowed, u64::MAX for inf, 0 to disable borrows (protected deposits)

fields.name: token_info
docs: Token id from TokenInfos struct

fields.name: deposit_withdrawal_cap
docs: Deposit withdrawal caps - deposit & redeem

fields.name: debt_withdrawal_cap
docs: Debt withdrawal caps - borrow & repay

fields.name: utilization_limit_block_borrowing_above_pct
docs: Utilization (in percentage) above which borrowing is blocked. 0 to disable.

fields.name: autodeleverage_enabled
docs: Whether this reserve should be subject to auto-deleveraging after deposit or borrow limit is
crossed.
Besides this flag, the lending market's flag also needs to be enabled (logical `AND`).
**NOTE:** the manual "target LTV" deleveraging (enabled by the risk council for individual
obligations) is NOT affected by this flag.

fields.name: proposer_authority_locked
docs: Boolean flag indicating whether the reserve is locked for the proposer authority.
Once the proposer have finished preparing the reserve, it must be locked to prevent
further changes to the reserve configuration allowing review and voting on the proposal
without alteration during the voting period.

fields.name: borrow_limit_outside_elevation_group
docs: Maximum amount liquidity of this reserve borrowed outside all elevation groups
- u64::MAX for inf
- 0 to disable borrows outside elevation groups

fields.name: borrow_limit_against_this_collateral_in_elevation_group
docs: Defines the maximum amount (in lamports of elevation group debt asset)
that can be borrowed when this reserve is used as collateral.
- u64::MAX for inf
- 0 to disable borrows in this elevation group (expected value for the debt asset)

fields.name: deleveraging_bonus_increase_bps_per_day
docs: The rate at which the deleveraging-related liquidation bonus increases, in bps per day.
Only relevant when `autodeleverage_enabled == 1`, and must not be 0 in such case.

fields.name: debt_maturity_timestamp
docs: The timestamp at which all [Obligation::borrows] using this reserve become liquidatable
(on the same terms as reserve-wide deleveraging).
Inactive when zeroed (i.e. debt never matures).

types.name: ReserveFees
docs: Additional fee information on a reserve
These exist separately from interest accrual fees, and are specifically for the program owner
and referral fee. The fees are paid out as a percentage of liquidity token amounts during
repayments and liquidations.

fields.name: borrow_fee_sf
docs: Fee assessed on `BorrowObligationLiquidity`, as scaled fraction (60 bits fractional part)
Must be between `0` and `2^60`, such that `2^60 = 1`.  A few examples for
clarity:

fields.name: flash_loan_fee_sf
docs: Fee for flash loan, expressed as scaled fraction.

fields.name: padding
docs: Used for allignment

types.name: ReserveLiquidity
docs: Reserve liquidity

fields.name: mint_pubkey
docs: Reserve liquidity mint address

fields.name: supply_vault
docs: Reserve liquidity supply address

fields.name: fee_vault
docs: Reserve liquidity fee collection address

fields.name: available_amount
docs: Reserve liquidity available

fields.name: borrowed_amount_sf
docs: Reserve liquidity borrowed (scaled fraction)

fields.name: market_price_sf
docs: Reserve liquidity market price in quote currency (scaled fraction)

fields.name: market_price_last_updated_ts
docs: Unix timestamp of the market price (from the oracle)

fields.name: mint_decimals
docs: Reserve liquidity mint decimals

fields.name: deposit_limit_crossed_timestamp
docs: Timestamp when the last refresh reserve detected that the liquidity amount is above the deposit cap. When this threshold is crossed, then redemptions (auto-deleverage) are enabled.
If the threshold is not crossed, then the timestamp is set to 0

fields.name: borrow_limit_crossed_timestamp
docs: Timestamp when the last refresh reserve detected that the borrowed amount is above the borrow cap. When this threshold is crossed, then redemptions (auto-deleverage) are enabled.
If the threshold is not crossed, then the timestamp is set to 0

fields.name: cumulative_borrow_rate_bsf
docs: Reserve liquidity cumulative borrow rate (scaled fraction)

fields.name: accumulated_protocol_fees_sf
docs: Reserve cumulative protocol fees (scaled fraction)

fields.name: accumulated_referrer_fees_sf
docs: Reserve cumulative referrer fees (scaled fraction)

fields.name: pending_referrer_fees_sf
docs: Reserve pending referrer fees, to be claimed in refresh_obligation by referrer or protocol (scaled fraction)

fields.name: absolute_referral_rate_sf
docs: Reserve referrer fee absolute rate calculated at each refresh_reserve operation (scaled fraction)

fields.name: token_program
docs: Token program of the liquidity mint

types.name: WithdrawalCaps
docs: Reserve Withdrawal Caps State

fields.name: lower
docs: Lower value of acceptable price

fields.name: upper
docs: Upper value of acceptable price

fields.name: exp
docs: Number of decimals of the previously defined values

fields.name: price
docs: Pubkey of the base price feed (disabled if `null` or `default`)

fields.name: price_feed
docs: Pubkey of the scope price feed (disabled if `null` or `default`)

fields.name: price_chain
docs: This is the scope_id price chain that results in a price for the token

fields.name: twap_chain
docs: This is the scope_id price chain for the twap

fields.name: price_aggregator
docs: Pubkey of the base price feed (disabled if `null` or `default`)

fields.name: name
docs: UTF-8 encoded name of the token (null-terminated)

fields.name: heuristic
docs: Heuristics limits of acceptable price

fields.name: max_twap_divergence_bps
docs: Max divergence between twap and price in bps

fields.name: scope_configuration
docs: Scope price configuration

fields.name: switchboard_configuration
docs: Switchboard configuration

fields.name: pyth_configuration
docs: Pyth configuration

fields.name: token_allocation_cap
docs: Maximum token invested in this reserve

fields.name: version
docs: Version of the reserve

fields.name: last_update
docs: Last slot when supply and rates updated

fields.name: lending_market
docs: Lending market address

fields.name: liquidity
docs: Reserve liquidity

fields.name: collateral
docs: Reserve collateral

fields.name: config
docs: Reserve configuration values

fields.name: borrowed_amounts_against_this_reserve_in_elevation_groups
docs: Amount of token borrowed in lamport of debt asset in the given
elevation group when this reserve is part of the collaterals.
